name: Jumpy McJumpFace
description:
Help the Knight, Jumpy McJumpFace and his band of trusted companions survive in this simple 2D runner. As you dash and run across the game avoid certain death for as long as possible with quick reactions by jumping over spikes and buzzsaws as they appear and gravity in the world changes.

Endless gameplay
20 Characters to unlock
Frustration highly likely

Characters include the footballer, dinosaur, caveman, robot, balloon dog and many more.
